text: And to Soliman the wind/breeze its going early (for a) month and its departure (passing) (for a month), and We made the molten copper/brass/iron well flow/dissolve/melt for him, and from the Jinns who works between his hands with his Lord`s permission/pardon, and who deviates/turns away from them from Our order/command, We make him taste/experience from the blazing`s/inflamed`s (inferno`s) torture
